data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Portland to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lucas Cavallini for Vancouver gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 11, Armando Villarreal awards Portland a goal kick.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 14, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portland have a goal kick.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Throw-in for Vancouver at Providence Park.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Vancouver's area.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 27, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 32, Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Vancouver.
Portland are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for Portland in Portland.
Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Portland have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Vancouver.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Vancouver's Cristian Dajome gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portland defender.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Vancouver surge into the attack at Providence Park but Cristian Dajome’s header is off-target.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 45, At Providence Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Portland.
In the minute 46, Armando Villarreal signals a Portland throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Armando Villarreal awards Portland a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Vancouver.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 56, Portland push forward at Providence Park and Felipe Mora gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vancouver defence.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
In the minute 57, Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Vancouver's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Portland in Portland.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Portland have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Vancouver.
Goal! Portland have got their heads in front thanks to a Yimmi Chara strike.
In the minute 61, Great play from Jorge Villafana to set up the goal.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Portland.
In the minute 67, Attention is being given to Portland’s Pablo Bonilla and play has been suspended briefly.
Portland's Pablo Bonilla is back in action after a slight knock.
The away team have replaced Russell Teibert with Tosaint Ricketts. This is the first substitution made today by Marc Dos Santos.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 78, Portland make their first substitution with Jaroslaw Niezgoda replacing Felipe Mora.
Andy Polo of Portland gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Vancouver at Providence Park.
In the minute 79, Michael Baldisimo is on a sub for Janio Bikel for Vancouver.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
Vancouver drives forward and Lucas Cavallini gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
The away team replace Jake Nerwinski with Theo Bair.
Marco Farfan is replacing Pablo Bonilla for the home team.
In the minute 84, Andres Flores is replacing Yimmi Chara for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Throw-in for Vancouver at Providence Park.
In the minute 88, In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Michael Baldisimo (Vancouver) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Providence Park, Portland are penalized for being offside.
Free kick in a good position for Vancouver!
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Throw-in Portland.
Armando Villarreal awards Portland a goal kick.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In Portland, Portland push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
That's full-time at Providence Park. The final score is 1-0.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Diego Valeri.
Marvin Loria is replacing Jaroslaw Niezgoda for Portland at Providence Park.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's fifth substitution at Providence Park with Cristhian Paredes replacing Diego Valeri.
